
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VNtscColorBars.cpp
          VNtscColorBars.h
          VNtscColorBars__Syms.cpp
          VNtscColorBars__Syms.h
  DEPENDS NtscColorBars.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NtscColorBars.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VNtscColorBars STATIC
    VNtscColorBars.cpp
    VNtscColorBars__Syms.cpp
    NtscColorBars.v
)

target_compile_options(VNtscColorBars PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VNtscColorBars PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VNtscColorBars verilated)
